TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlReaderSettings extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定要在由 方法建立的 物件上支援的一組功能。

span.span: Specifies a set of features to support on the object created by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用方法，以取得執行個體。You use the method to obtain instances. 這個方法會使用類別，以指定要在實作哪些功能它所建立的物件。This method uses the class to specify which features to implement in the object it creates. 請參閱 < 備註 > 一節的和參考頁面的一致性檢查、 驗證和其他常見的案例使用的設定資訊。See the Remarks sections of the and reference pages for information about which settings to use for conformance checks, validation, and other common scenarios. 請參閱建構函式的預設設定的清單。See the constructor for a list of default settings. ## 安全性考量Security considerations 使用時，請考慮下列類別。Consider the following when using the class. - 依預設，不會設定 物件的 及 驗證旗標。The and validation flags of an object are not set by default. 當設定這些旗標時， 物件的 可用於解析在 的執行個體文件中發現的結構描述位置。When these flags are set, the of the object is used to resolve schema locations encountered in the instance document in the . 如果物件是`null`，就不會解析結構描述位置即使和設定驗證旗標。If the object is `null`, schema locations are not resolved even if the and validation flags are set. - 驗證期間加入的結構描述會加入新型別，並可變更要驗證之物件的驗證結果。Schemas added during validation add new types and can change the validation outcome of the document being validated. 因此，外部結構描述應僅從受信任的來源解析。As a result, external schemas should only be resolved from trusted sources. - 驗證錯誤訊息可能會公開敏感的內容模型的資訊。Validation error messages may expose sensitive content model information. 驗證錯誤和警告訊息則會使用處理委派，或公開為如果事件處理常式提供給物件 (不會導致驗證警告擲回)。Validation error and warning messages are handled using the delegate, or are exposed as an if no event handler is provided to the object (validation warnings do not cause an to be thrown). 此內容模型的資訊不應該公開受信任的案例中。This content model information should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 驗證警告訊息依預設會隱藏，而且可以藉由設定報告旗標。Validation warning messages are suppressed by default and can be reported by setting the flag. - 屬性回到造成例外狀況的結構描述檔案的 URI 路徑。The property of an returns the URI path to the schema file that caused the exception. 屬性不應該公開受信任的案例中。The property should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. - 停用旗標 （預設為啟用） 時，建議使用驗證、 不受信任、 大型的 XML 中的文件結構描述含有識別條件約束的高可用性案例透過文件的一個重要部分。Disabling the flag (enabled by default) is recommended when validating, untrusted, large XML documents in high availability scenarios against a schema with identity constraints over a large part of the document. - 物件可以包含機密資訊 (如使用者認證)。 objects can contain sensitive information such as user credentials. 快取 物件，或將 物件從一個元件傳遞至另一元件時，請務必小心。You should be careful when caching objects, or when passing the object from one component to another. - DTD 處理預設會停用。DTD processing is disabled by default. 如果您啟用 DTD 處理，您需要注意的 dtd 從受信任的來源和可能的阻絕服務攻擊。If you enable DTD processing, you need to be aware of including DTDs from untrusted sources and possible denial of service attacks. 使用，限制的資源，可以存取。Use the to restrict the resources that the can access. - 請不要接受來自不受信任來源的支援元件，如 、 及 物件。Do not accept supporting components, such as , , and objects, from an untrusted source. - 使用 之應用程式的記憶體使用量可能與剖析的 XML 文件大小相互關聯。Memory usage of an application that uses may have a correlation to the size of the parsed XML document. 一種形式的阻絕服務攻擊發生於送出過多的 XML 文件進行剖析時。One form of denial of service attack is when excessively large XML documents are submitted to be parsed. 您可以限制可以藉由設定剖析的文件大小屬性，然後限制產生自展開實體所設定的字元數屬性。You can limit the size of the document that can be parsed by setting the property and then limit the number of characters that result from expanding entities by setting the property. ## Examples 下列範例會建立使用具有必要認證。The following example creates an that uses an with the necessary credentials. [!code-csharp[XmlReader.Create#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.Create/CS/XmlReader_Create.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XmlReader.Create#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.Create/VB/XmlReader_Create.vb#2)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`。`false`.| ||`true`。`true`.| ||。.| ||`false`。`false`.| ||`false`。`false`.| ||`false`。`false`.| ||0.0.| ||0.0.| ||0 （沒有產生自展開實體的字元數目沒有限制）。0 (there is no limit on the number of characters that result from expanding entities).| ||0 (無限制的 XML 文件大小)。0 (there is no limit on the size of the XML document).| ||`null`。`null`.| ||| ||`true`。`true`. 這個屬性已經過時。This property is obsolete. 請改用 。Use instead. 如果您已設定為其預設值`true`設定至`Prohibit`。If you had set to its default value `true` set to `Prohibit`. 如果您已設定至`false`設定至`Parse`。If you had set to `false` set to `Parse`.| ||空的 物件。An empty object.| ||。.| ||。.| ||新的 物件。A new object.| ## Examples 下列範例會建立可以用來建構去除處理指示、 註解，並不顯著泛空白字元的讀取器的設定物件。The following creates a settings object that can be used to construct a reader that strips processing instructions, comments, and insignificant white space. [!code-cpp[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/CPP/XmlReaderSettings.cctor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/CS/factory_rdr_cctor2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/VB/factory_rdr_cctor2.vb#1)]

span.span: The XML resolver.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Async { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定非同步 方法是否可以用於特定 執行個體。

span.span: Gets or sets whether asynchronous methods can be used on a particular instance.

value.span: 如果可以使用非同步方法，則為 ，否則為。

span.span: if asynchronous methods can be used; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須將此值設定為`true`當您建立新執行個體，如果您想要使用非同步該執行個體上的方法。You must set this value to `true` when you create a new instance if you want to use asynchronous methods on that instance. 之後建立執行個體時，屬性是唯讀的。After the instance is created, the property is read-only. 此屬性的預設值為 `false`。The default value of this property is `false`. 這個旗標會忽略多載。This flag is ignored by the overload. 這表示，如果您建立新根據現有，非同步行為取決於輸入，而且您無法使用變更非同步行為的旗標。This means that if you create a new based on an existing , the async behavior depends on the input , and you cannot use the flag to change the async behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CheckCharacters { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，綁表示是否要執行字元檢查。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to do character checking.

value.span: 表示執行字元檢查，否則為 。

span.span: to do character checking; otherwise .
The default is .

para.span: 如果 正在處理文字資料，則它會始終檢查 XML 名稱和文字內容是否有效，而不論屬性設定。

span.span: If the is processing text data, it always checks that the XML names and text content are valid, regardless of the property setting.

para.span: 將 設為 會關閉字元實體參考的字元檢查。

span.span: Setting to turns off character checking for character entity references.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指示的 XML 讀取器來檢查它正在讀取，則擲回的 XML 資料中的字元如果任何字元都是合法的 XML 字元的範圍之外。This property instructs the XML reader to check characters in the XML data it's reading and throw an if any characters are outside the range of legal XML characters. 啟用字元檢查時，可確保：When character checking is enabled, you are ensured the following: - 所定義的字元都是合法的 XML 字元的範圍內[2.2 字元](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#charsets)的 W3C XML 1.0 版建議事項 > 一節。Characters are within the range of legal XML characters, as defined by the [2.2 Characters](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#charsets) section of the W3C XML 1.0 Recommendation. - 所定義的所有 XML 名稱都是否有效， [2.3 Common Syntactic Constructs](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#NT-Name)的 W3C XML 1.0 版建議事項 > 一節。All XML names are valid, as defined by the [2.3 Common Syntactic Constructs](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#NT-Name) section of the W3C XML 1.0 Recommendation. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，這是預設的設定，如果 XML 檔案包含不合法的字元或無效的 XML 名稱，會擲回例外狀況 （例如，項目名稱以數字開頭）。When this property is set to `true`, which is the default setting, an exception is thrown if the XML file contains illegal characters or invalid XML names (for example, an element name starts with a number).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings Clone() cil managed

summary.span: 建立 執行個體的複本。

span.span: Creates a copy of the instance.
The cloned object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複製可以修改物件，而不會影響原始物件上的設定。The cloned object can be modified without affecting the settings on the original object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CloseInput { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該在關閉讀取器時關閉基礎資料流或 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the underlying stream or should be closed when the reader is closed.

value.span: 表示關閉讀取器時關閉基礎資料流或 ，否則為 。

span.span: to close the underlying stream or when the reader is closed; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當資料流時，會使用此設定或傳遞至方法。This setting is used when a stream or is passed to the method. 如果資料流由它自己的處理，讀取器，例如建立讀取器時使用的 URI，或開啟外部的文件類型定義時，它會一律關閉讀取器關閉時。If a stream is created by the reader for its own processing, such as when the reader is created with a URI or when it opens an external document type definition, it is always closed when the reader is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::ConformanceLevel ConformanceLevel { System::Xml::ConformanceLevel get(); void set(System::Xml::ConformanceLevel value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 要遵循的一致性層級。

span.span: Gets or sets the level of conformance which the will comply.

value.span: 其中一個列舉值，指定 XML 讀取器將強制執行的一致性層級。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the level of conformance that the XML reader will enforce.
The default is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 所建立的 XML 讀取器方法預設符合下列相容性需求：XML readers that are created by the method meet the following compliance requirements by default: - 新行和屬性值會根據 W3C 正規化[XML 1.0 版建議事項](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)。New lines and attribute value are normalized according to the W3C [XML 1.0 Recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/). - 所有實體會自動都展開。All entities are automatically expanded. - 即使在不會驗證讀取器時，會固定加入文件類型定義中宣告預設屬性。Default attributes declared in the document type definition are always added even when the reader does not validate. - 允許宣告的 XML 前置詞對應至正確的 XML 命名空間 URI。Declaration of XML prefix mapped to the correct XML namespace URI is allowed. - 在單一標記法名稱`NotationType`屬性宣告和`NmTokens`在單一`Enumeration`屬性宣告各有不同。The notation names in a single `NotationType` attribute declaration and `NmTokens` in a single `Enumeration` attribute declaration are distinct. 您可以使用屬性來檢查並確保所讀取的資料流符合格式正確的 XML 1.0 版文件或文件片段的規則。You can use the property to check and guarantee that the stream being read complies with the rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document or document fragment. 如果資料不符合，擲回例外狀況。If the data doesn't comply, an exception is thrown. 預設值是（文件層級的一致性）。The default is (document-level conformance). 三個一致性層級為：The three conformance levels are: |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||可確保 XML 資料符合格式正確的 XML 1.0 版文件的規則。Ensures that the XML data conforms to the rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document. 這個層級的檢查可確保任何處理器都可使用做為要讀取的資料流[語式正確的 XML 1.0 文件](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#sec-well-formed)。This level of checking ensures that any processor can consume the stream being read as an [well-formed XML 1.0 document](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#sec-well-formed).

讀取器會檢查下列項目：The reader checks for the following:

-最上層項目必須沒有 XML 宣告、 文件類型定義 (DTD)、 元素、 註解、 泛空白字元或處理指示以外的任何節點。- The top-level item must not have any nodes other than XML Declaration, document type definition (DTD), element, comment, white space, or processing instruction.
-的 XML 資料必須剛好只有一個最上層元素節點。- The XML data must have exactly one top-level element node.| ||可確保 XML 資料符合格式正確的 XML 1.0 版文件片段的規則。Ensures that the XML data conforms to the rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document fragment.

此設定接受在最上層具有多個根項目或文字節點的 XML 資料。This setting accepts XML data with multiple root elements, or text nodes at the top-level. 這個層級的檢查可確保任何處理器都可使用做為要讀取的資料流[外部剖析實體](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#wf-entities)。This level of checking ensures that any processor can consume the stream being read as an [external parsed entity](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#wf-entities).| ||指定讀取器應該決定根據內送資料的一致性檢查的層級。Specifies that the reader should determine the level of conformance checking based on the incoming data.

如果 XML 資料包含 DTD 資訊，則會套用文件一致性檢查。Document conformance checking is applied if the XML data contains DTD information.

如果 XML 資料包含下列其中一項，則會套用片段一致性檢查：Fragment conformance checking is applied if the XML data contains one of following:

文字、 CDATA 或實體參考節點根層級。- Text, CDATA, or entity reference node at the root level.
-多個項目根層級。- More than one element at the root level.
的根層級任何項目。- No element at the root level.

如果存在衝突 (如根層級存在文字節點及 DTD)，則會擲回 。An is thrown if there is a conflict, such as when there is a text node and a DTD at the root level.

當使用 方法向現有 加入其他功能時，此設定可以用於包裝案例。This setting can be used in wrapping scenarios when the method is used to add additional features to an existing . 在此情況下，不會新增任何新的一致性檢查。In this case, does not add any new conformance checking. 一致性檢查會留給被包裝的 。Conformance checking is left to the that is being wrapped.| > [!NOTE] > 存在 DTD 時，XML 1.0 版建議事項會要求文件層級的一致性。The XML 1.0 recommendation requires document-level conformance when a DTD is present. 因此，如果讀取器已設定為支援，XML 資料包含文件類型定義 (DTD)，但就會擲回。Therefore, if the reader is configured to support , but the XML data contains a document type definition (DTD), an is thrown. 以下是 讀取器如何處理根據設定的特定一致性違規屬性：Here's how the reader handles specific conformance violations depending on the setting of the property: |條件Condition|||| |---------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |文字或具類型的值會出現在最上層。Text or a typed value appears at the top level.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.|不會視為違規情形，這項設定。Not considered a violation for this setting.|不會視為違規情形，這項設定。Not considered a violation for this setting.| |多個項目或沒有任何項目會出現在最上層。Multiple elements or no element appear at the top level.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.|不會視為違規情形，這項設定。Not considered a violation for this setting.|不會視為違規情形，這項設定。Not considered a violation for this setting.| |最上層項目是泛空白字元。Top-level item is white space.|不會視為違規情形，這項設定。Not considered a violation for this setting.|不會視為違規情形，這項設定。Not considered a violation for this setting.|不會視為違規情形，這項設定。Not considered a violation for this setting.| |最上層項目是 （辨識為文字節點） 的屬性。Top-level item is an attribute (recognized as a text node).| 就會擲回。 is thrown.|不會視為違規情形，這項設定。Not considered a violation for this setting.|不會視為違規情形，這項設定。Not considered a violation for this setting.| |找到多個連續的文字節點。Multiple, contiguous text nodes are found.|不會視為違規情形，這項設定。Not considered a violation for this setting.|不會視為違規情形，這項設定。Not considered a violation for this setting.|不會視為違規情形，這項設定。Not considered a violation for this setting.| |兩次相同的本機範圍中宣告相同的命名空間前置詞。The same namespace prefix is declared twice in the same local scope.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| |中的項目或屬性的命名空間不存在於本機範圍。The namespace in an element or attribute doesn't exist in the local scope.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| |資料包含前置詞命名空間不相符。Data contains a prefix-namespace mismatch.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| |`xml:space` 屬性包含無效的值。`xml:space` attribute contains an invalid value.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| |發現無效的名稱。An invalid name is encountered.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| |`xml`前置詞未對應到http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespaceURI。The `xml` prefix isn't matched to the http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace URI.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| 就會擲回。 is thrown.| ## Examples 下列範例會建立讀取的 XML 片段的物件。The following example creates an object that reads an XML fragment. [!code-csharp[XmlReader.Create#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.Create/CS/XmlReader_Create.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReader.Create#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.Create/VB/XmlReader_Create.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::DtdProcessing DtdProcessing { System::Xml::DtdProcessing get(); void set(System::Xml::DtdProcessing value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定決定 DTD 處理的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the processing of DTDs.

value.span: 其中一個列舉值，決定 DTD 處理方式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that determines the processing of DTDs.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件類型定義 (DTD) 驗證使用 W3C 中定義的有效性條件約束來實作[可延伸標記語言 (XML) 1.0 （第四版） 建議](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)。Document type definition (DTD) validation is implemented by using the validity constraints defined in the W3C [Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 (fourth edition) recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/). Dtd 可用於正式文法描述的結構和語法相容的 XML 文件。指定內容以及 XML 文件所允許的值。DTDs use a formal grammar to describe the structure and syntax of compliant XML documents; they specify the content and values allowed for the XML document. 這個屬性可以具有下列其中一個值：This property can have one of the following values: - 若要啟用 DTD 處理。 to enable DTD processing. - 擲回遇到 DTD 時的例外狀況。 to throw an exception when a DTD is encountered. - 若要停用 DTD 處理，而警告或例外狀況。 to disable DTD processing without warnings or exceptions. 若要執行 DTD 驗證， 會使用在 XML 文件之 DOCTYPE 宣告中所定義的 DTD。To perform validation against a DTD, the uses the DTD defined in the DOCTYPE declaration of an XML document. DOCTYPE 宣告可以指向內嵌 DTD，也可以是外部 DTD 檔案的參考。The DOCTYPE declaration can either point to an inline DTD or can be a reference to an external DTD file. 若要驗證 dtd 的 XML 檔案：To validate an XML file against a DTD: - 將 屬性設定為 `DtdProcessing.Parse.`Set the property to `DtdProcessing.Parse.` - 將 屬性設定為 `ValidationType.DTD`。Set the property to `ValidationType.DTD`. - 如果 DTD 是儲存在需要驗證之網路資源上的外部檔案，請將具有必要認證的 物件傳遞至 方法。If the DTD is an external file stored on a network resource that requires authentication, pass an object with the necessary credentials to the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果屬性設定為、將不會報告 Dtd。If the property is set to , the will not report the DTDs. 這表示 DTD/文件類型將會遺失輸出上。This means that the DTD/DOCTYPE will be lost on output. ## Examples 下列範例使用 DTD 檔案驗證 XML 檔案。The following example validates an XML file using a DTD file. [!code-cpp[XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate/CPP/XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate/CS/validdtd.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate/VB/validdtd.vb#1)] ## 輸入Input 該範例使用 `itemDTD.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example uses the `itemDTD.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate/XML/itemDTD.xml#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IgnoreComments { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否忽略註解。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore comments.
to ignore comments; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性設定為`true`可能會導致從讀取器傳回的多個連續的文字節點。Setting this property to `true` can result in multiple contiguous text nodes being returned from the reader. 這不會影響驗證。This does not affect validation. ## Examples 下列範例會建立可以用來建構去除處理指示、 註解，並不顯著泛空白字元的讀取器的設定物件。The following creates a settings object that can be used to construct a reader that strips processing instructions, comments, and insignificant white space. [!code-cpp[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/CPP/XmlReaderSettings.cctor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/CS/factory_rdr_cctor2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/VB/factory_rdr_cctor2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IgnoreProcessingInstructions { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否忽略處理指示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore processing instructions.

value.span: 表示忽略處理指示，否則為 。

span.span: to ignore processing instructions; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性設定為`true`可能會導致從讀取器傳回的多個連續的文字節點。Setting this property to `true` can result in multiple contiguous text nodes being returned from the reader. 這不會影響驗證。This does not affect validation. ## Examples 下列範例會建立可以用來建構去除處理指示、 註解，並不顯著泛空白字元的讀取器的設定物件。The following creates a settings object that can be used to construct a reader that strips processing instructions, comments, and insignificant white space. [!code-cpp[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/CPP/XmlReaderSettings.cctor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/CS/factory_rdr_cctor2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/VB/factory_rdr_cctor2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IgnoreWhitespace { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否忽略不重要的空白字元。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore insignificant white space.

value.span: 表示忽略泛空白字元，否則為 。

span.span: to ignore white space; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不是重大的泛空白字元包含空格、 定位點和空白的行用來設定分開的可讀性更高的標記。White space that is not considered to be significant includes spaces, tabs, and blank lines used to set apart the markup for greater readability. 其中一個範例就是項目內容中的泛空白字元。An example of this is white space in element content. 此屬性設定不會影響混合內容模式中或發生的範圍內的空白字元中標記間的泛空白字元`xml:space='preserve'`屬性。This property setting does not affect white space between markup in a mixed content mode, or white space that occurs within the scope of an `xml:space='preserve'` attribute. ## Examples 下列範例會建立可以用來建構去除處理指示、 註解，並不顯著泛空白字元的讀取器的設定物件。The following creates a settings object that can be used to construct a reader that strips processing instructions, comments, and insignificant white space. [!code-cpp[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/CPP/XmlReaderSettings.cctor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/CS/factory_rdr_cctor2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/VB/factory_rdr_cctor2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int LineNumberOffset { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件的行號位移。

span.span: Gets or sets line number offset of the object.
The line number offset.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定會決定該點其中屬性會開始計算。The setting determines the point where the property starts counting. 這非常有用，如果較大的文件中內嵌 XML 資料。This is useful if your XML data is embedded within a larger document. 比方說，如果您的 XML 資料內嵌在較大的文件中，資料列 101 的文件上開始，您可能要指定讀取器開始列 100。For example, if your XML data were embedded in a larger document, and your data started on line 101 of the document, you may want to specify that the reader start at line 100. 因此，如果讀取器擲回例外狀況，剖析 XML 的第一行，它會報告為行 101，而不是第 1 行的行號。Therefore, if the reader threw an exception while parsing the first line of the XML, it would report the line number as line 101, rather than line 1.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int LinePositionOffset { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件的行位置位移。

span.span: Gets or sets line position offset of the object.
The line position offset.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定會決定該點其中屬性會開始計算。The setting determines the point where the property starts counting. 如果 XML 資料內嵌於較大的文件內，而且沒有任何新行開頭的 xml，這非常有用。This is useful if your XML data is embedded within a larger document and there is no new line at the beginning of the XML. 在此情況下，如果讀取器擲回例外狀況剖析 XML 時，您要它傳回相對於主要的文件，不只是相對的 XML 片段的行位置。In this case, if the reader throws an exception while parsing the XML, you want it to return the line position relative to the main document, not just relative to the XML fragment.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxCharactersFromEntities { long get(); void set(long value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出文件中產生自展開實體的最大可允許字元數。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum allowable number of characters in a document that result from expanding entities.

value.span: 來自展開實體的最大可允許字元數。

span.span: The maximum allowable number of characters from expanded entities.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 零 (0) 的值表示所產生自展開實體的字元數目沒有限制。A zero (0) value means no limits on the number of characters that result from expanding entities. 為非零的值會指定可以產生自展開實體的字元數目上限。A non-zero value specifies the maximum number of characters that can result from expanding entities. 如果讀取器會嘗試讀取擴充的大小會超過這個屬性，包含實體的文件就會擲回。If the reader attempts to read a document that contains entities such that the expanded size will exceed this property, an will be thrown. 這個屬性可讓您為減少阻絕服務攻擊，攻擊者要送出嘗試超過記憶體限制，透過展開實體的 XML 文件。This property allows you to mitigate denial of service attacks where the attacker submits XML documents that attempt to exceed memory limits via expanding entities. 藉由限制產生自展開實體的字元，您可以偵測攻擊，和可靠地復原。By limiting the characters that result from expanded entities, you can detect the attack and recover reliably. ## Examples 下列程式碼會設定這個屬性，並嘗試剖析的文件包含實體會展開成大小大於設定的限制。The following code sets this property, and then attempts to parse a document that contains an entity that expands to a size greater than the set limit. 在真實世界案例中，則可以將這項限制夠大，無法處理有效的文件尚未值夠小，來限制從惡意文件的威脅。In a real world scenario, you would set this limit to a value large enough to handle valid documents, yet small enough to limit the threat from malicious documents. ```csharp string markup = @" ]> Content &anEntity;"; XmlReaderSettings settings = new XmlReaderSettings(); settings.DtdProcessing = DtdProcessing.Parse; settings.ValidationType = ValidationType.DTD; settings.MaxCharactersFromEntities = 30; try { XmlReader reader = XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(markup), settings); while (reader.Read()) { } } catch (XmlException ex) { Console.WriteLine(ex.Message); } ``` ```vb Dim markup As String = _ "" + Environment.NewLine + _ " " + Environment.NewLine + _ "]>" + Environment.NewLine + _ "Content &anEntity;" Dim settings As XmlReaderSettings = New XmlReaderSettings() settings.DtdProcessing = DtdProcessing.Parse; settings.ValidationType = ValidationType.DTD settings.MaxCharactersFromEntities = 30 Try Dim reader As XmlReader = XmlReader.Create(New StringReader(markup), settings) While (reader.Read()) End While Catch ex As XmlException Console.WriteLine(ex.Message) End Try ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` There is an error in XML document (MaxCharactersFromEntities, ). ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxCharactersInDocument { long get(); void set(long value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 XML 文件中最大可允許字元數。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum allowable number of characters in an XML document.

summary.span: 零 (0) 的值表示對 XML 文件大小沒有限制。

span.span: A zero (0) value means no limits on the size of the XML document.

summary.span: 非零值指定大小上限，以字元為單位。

span.span: A non-zero value specifies the maximum size, in characters.

value.span: XML 文件的最大可允許字元數。

span.span: The maximum allowable number of characters in an XML document.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 零 (0) 的值表示已剖析的文件中的字元數目沒有限制。A zero (0) value means no limits on the number of characters in the parsed document. 為非零值指定最大可以剖析的字元數。A non-zero value specifies the maximum number of characters that can be parsed. 文件的最大字元數包含產生自展開實體的字元的計數。The maximum character count for the document includes the count of characters that result from expanded entities. 如果讀取器會嘗試讀取文件大小超過這個屬性，就會擲回。If the reader attempts to read a document with a size that exceeds this property, an will be thrown. 這個屬性可讓您為減少阻絕服務攻擊，攻擊者要送出極大型 XML 文件。This property allows you to mitigate denial of service attacks where the attacker submits extremely large XML documents. 藉由限制的文件大小，您可以偵測攻擊，和可靠地復原。By limiting the size of a document, you can detect the attack and recover reliably. ## Examples 下列程式碼會設定這個屬性，並嘗試剖析的文件大小超過限制。The following code sets this property, and then attempts to parse a document larger than the limit. 在真實世界案例中，則可以將這項限制夠大，無法處理有效的文件尚未值夠小，來限制從惡意文件的威脅。In a real world scenario, you would set this limit to a value large enough to handle valid documents, yet small enough to limit the threat from malicious documents. ```csharp string markup = "Content"; XmlReaderSettings settings = new XmlReaderSettings(); settings.MaxCharactersInDocument = 10; try { XmlReader reader = XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(markup), settings); while (reader.Read()) { } } catch (XmlException ex) { Console.WriteLine(ex.Message); } ``` ```vb Dim markup As String = "Content" Dim settings As XmlReaderSettings = New XmlReaderSettings() settings.MaxCharactersInDocument = 10 Try Dim reader As XmlReader = XmlReader.Create(New StringReader(markup), settings) While (reader.Read()) End While Catch ex As XmlException Console.WriteLine(ex.Message) End Try ``` 此程式碼會產生下列輸出：This code produces the following output: ``` There is an error in XML document (MaxCharactersInDocument, ). ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlNameTable ^ NameTable { System::Xml::XmlNameTable ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::XmlNameTable ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用來比較已擷取字串的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the used for atomized string comparisons.

value.span: ，儲存使用這個 物件建立之所有 執行個體所使用的所有原子化字串。

span.span: The that stores all the atomized strings used by all instances created using this object.
The default is .

value.span: 如果這個值為 ，則建立的 執行個體會使用新的空 。

span.span: The created instance will use a new empty if this value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為執行個體，如果您想要共用通用名稱表格中，所有之間建立執行個體。Set this property to an instance if you want to share a common name table among all the created instances. > [!NOTE] > 類別不是安全執行緒。The class is not thread-safe. 因此它無法在之間共用不同執行緒中同時執行的物件。Therefore it cannot be shared between objects that run simultaneously in different threads.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ProhibitDtd { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否禁止物件類型定義 (DTD) 處理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to prohibit document type definition (DTD) processing.

summary.span: 這個屬性已經過時。

span.span: This property is obsolete.

summary.span: 請改用 。

span.span: Use instead.

value.span: 表示禁止 DTD 處理，否則為 。

span.span: to prohibit DTD processing; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定為`true`、會擲回時遇到任何 DTD 內容。When set to `true`, the throws an when any DTD content is encountered. 如果您顧慮阻絕服務問題或正在處理不受信任的來源，請勿啟用 DTD 處理。Do not enable DTD processing if you are concerned about Denial of Service issues or if you are dealing with untrusted sources. 如果已啟用 DTD 處理，則可使用 限制 可存取的資源。If you have DTD processing enabled, you can use the to restrict the resources that the can access. 您還可以設計應用程式，讓 XML 處理具有記憶體和時間限制。You can also design your application so that the XML processing is memory and time constrained. 例如，在 ASP.NET 應用程式中設定逾時限制。For example, configure time-out limits in your ASP.NET application. 這個屬性已經過時。This property is obsolete. 請改用 。Use instead. 如果您已設定為其預設值`true`設定至`Prohibit`。If you had set to its default value `true` set to `Prohibit`. 如果您已設定至`false`設定至`Parse`。If you had set to `false` set to `Parse`. ## Examples 下列範例會使用 DTD 的資料。The following example validates data using a DTD. [!code-cpp[XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate/CPP/XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate/CS/validdtd.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate/VB/validdtd.vb#1)] 此範例會使用 itemDTD.xml 檔案做為輸入。The example uses the itemDTD.xml file as input. [!code-xml[XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.DtdValidate/XML/itemDTD.xml#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 將設定類別的成員重設為其預設值。

span.span: Resets the members of the settings class to their default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`。`false`.| ||`true`。`true`.| ||。.| ||`false`。`false`.| ||`false`。`false`.| ||`false`。`false`.| ||0.0.| ||0.0.| ||0 （沒有產生自展開實體的字元數目沒有限制）。0 (there is no limit on the number of characters that result from expanding entities).| ||0 (無限制的 XML 文件大小)。0 (there is no limit on the size of the XML document).| ||`null`。`null`.| ||| ||`true`。`true`. 這個屬性已經過時。This property is obsolete. 請改用 。Use instead. 如果您已設定為其預設值`true`設定至`Prohibit`。If you had set to its default value `true` set to `Prohibit`. 如果您已設定至`false`設定至`Parse`。If you had set to `false` set to `Parse`.| ||空的 物件。An empty object.| ||。.| ||。.| ||新的 物件。A new object.|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaSet ^ Schemas { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaSet ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaSet ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要在執行結構描述驗證時使用的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the to use when performing schema validation.

value.span: 執行結構描述驗證時使用的。

span.span: The to use when performing schema validation.
The default is an empty object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > - 請勿從未知或未受信任的來源或位置的結構描述。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations. 如此一來，將危害您的程式碼的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. > - XML 結構描述 （包括內嵌結構描述） 是本質上容易遭到阻絕服務攻擊。不接受其在受信任的案例。XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios. > - 結構描述驗證錯誤訊息和例外狀況可能會公開機密資訊的內容模型或結構描述檔案的 URI 路徑。Schema validation error messages and exceptions may expose sensitive information about the content model or URI paths to the schema file. 請小心不要公開給未受信任的呼叫端的這項資訊。Be careful not to expose this information to untrusted callers. > - 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 安全性考量 > 一節。For additional information, see the "Security considerations" section. 類別僅支援 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述。The class only supports XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas. 所建立的執行個體方法不能設定成啟用 Xml-data Reduced (XDR) 結構描述驗證。 instances created by the method cannot be configured to enable XML-Data Reduced (XDR) schema validation. ## 安全性考量Security considerations - 請勿使用來源不明或不受信任來源的結構描述。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources. 如此一來，將危害您的程式碼的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. 類別預設用來解析外部結構描述。The class is used to resolve external schemas by default. 若要停用的 include，匯入、 解析度和重新定義結構描述的元素，設定屬性`null`。To disable resolution of include, import, and redefine elements of a schema, set the property to `null`. - 使用所引發的例外狀況類別，例如類別可能包含不應該公開受信任的案例中的機密資訊。Exceptions raised as a result of using the class, such as the class may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 例如，屬性回到造成例外狀況的結構描述檔案的 URI 路徑。For example, the property of an returns the URI path to the schema file that caused the exception. 屬性不應該公開受信任的案例中。The property should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 使機密資訊不會出現在受信任的案例，就應該正確地處理例外狀況。Exceptions should be properly handled so that this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios. ## Examples 使用下列範例物件和方法，以將結構描述與 XML 文件產生關聯。The example below uses the object and the method to associate a schema with an XML document. 結構描述加入至屬性物件。The schema is added to the property of the object. 值屬性是物件。The value of the property is an object. 結構描述來驗證 XML 文件符合結構描述內容模型。The schema is used to validate that the XML document conforms to the schema content model. 結構描述驗證錯誤和警告都由中定義物件。Schema validation errors and warnings are handled by the defined in the object. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/CPP/xmlschemasetexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/CS/xmlschemasetexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/VB/xmlschemasetexample.vb#1)] 此範例會使用將 books.xml 檔案做為輸入。The example uses the books.xml file as input. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/XML/books.xml#2)] 此範例會使用 books.xsd 檔案做為輸入。The example uses the books.xsd file as an input. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/XML/books.xsd#3)]

summary.span: 發生於讀取器遇到驗證錯誤時。

span.span: Occurs when the reader encounters validation errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果讀取 XML 執行個體文件時，發生這些事件會設為或。These events occur while reading an XML instance document if the is set to either or . 如果上已啟用的設定遇到任何驗證警告時，也可能會發生這些事件的屬性。If the setting has been enabled on the property these events also occur when any validation warnings are encountered. 如果讀取器設定進行驗證，而且已設定任何驗證事件處理常式，就會擲回的所有驗證錯誤。If the reader is configured for validation and no validation event handler has been set, an is thrown for all validation errors. (不會導致驗證警告擲回)。(Validation warnings do not cause an to be thrown). > [!IMPORTANT] > 驗證錯誤訊息可能會公開敏感的內容模型的資訊。Validation error messages may expose sensitive content model information. 驗證錯誤和警告訊息則會使用處理委派，或公開為如果事件處理常式提供給物件 (不會導致驗證警告擲回)。Validation error and warning messages are handled using the delegate, or are exposed as an if no event handler is provided to the object (validation warnings do not cause an to be thrown). 此內容模型的資訊不應該公開受信任的案例中。This content model information should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 驗證警告訊息依預設會隱藏，而且可以藉由設定報告旗標。Validation warning messages are suppressed by default and can be reported by setting the flag. > > 屬性回到造成例外狀況的結構描述檔案的 URI 路徑。The property of an returns the URI path to the schema file that caused the exception. 屬性不應該公開受信任的案例中。The property should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. ## Examples 下列範例顯示以指定要建立的讀取器，會使用內嵌結構描述驗證，也會顯示的驗證警告的設定。The following example shows the settings to specify to create a reader that validates using an inline schema and that also displays validation warnings. 驗證事件處理常式使用來區分各個警告和錯誤的列舉。The validation event handler uses the enumeration to differentiate between warnings and errors. [!code-csharp[XmlReaderSettings.IgnoreInlineSchema#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.IgnoreInlineSchema/CS/factory_rdr_cctor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderSettings.IgnoreInlineSchema#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.IgnoreInlineSchema/VB/factory_rdr_cctor.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaValidationFlags ValidationFlags { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaValidationFlags get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaValidationFlags value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示結構描述驗證設定。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the schema validation settings.

summary.span: 這個設定會套用至可驗證結構描述的 物件 ( 屬性設為 )。

span.span: This setting applies to objects that validate schemas ( property set to ).

value.span: 指定驗證選項的列舉值的位元組合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that specify validation options.
and are enabled by default.
, , and are disabled by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 依預設，不會設定 物件的 及 驗證旗標。The and validation flags of an object are not set by default. 當設定這些旗標時， 物件的 可用於解析在 的執行個體文件中發現的結構描述位置。When these flags are set, the of the object is used to resolve schema locations encountered in the instance document in the . 如果物件是`null`，就不會解析結構描述位置即使和設定驗證旗標。If the object is `null`, schema locations are not resolved even if the and validation flags are set. > > 驗證期間加入的結構描述會加入新型別，並可變更要驗證之物件的驗證結果。Schemas added during validation add new types and can change the validation outcome of the document being validated. 因此，外部結構描述應僅從受信任的來源解析。As a result, external schemas should only be resolved from trusted sources. > > 停用旗標 （預設為啟用） 時，建議使用驗證、 不受信任、 大型的 XML 中的文件結構描述含有識別條件約束的高可用性案例透過文件的一個重要部分。Disabling the flag (enabled by default) is recommended when validating, untrusted, large XML documents in high availability scenarios against a schema with identity constraints over a large part of the document. ## Examples 下列範例會針對內嵌 XML 結構描述的 XML 檔案驗證啟用設定。The following example validates an XML file against an inline XML Schema by enabling the setting. 設定 XML 讀取器，以顯示 驗證警告，sp 您也會看見預期的警告的根項目。The XML reader is configured to display validation warnings, sp you also see the expected warning on the root element. [!code-csharp[XmlReaderSettings.IgnoreInlineSchema#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.IgnoreInlineSchema/CS/factory_rdr_cctor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderSettings.IgnoreInlineSchema#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.IgnoreInlineSchema/VB/factory_rdr_cctor.vb#1)] ## 輸入Input 該範例採用 inlineSchema.xml 檔案做為輸入。The example uses the inlineSchema.xml file as input. [!code-xml[XmlReaderSettings.IgnoreInlineSchema#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.IgnoreInlineSchema/XML/inlineSchema.xml#3)] ## 輸出Output 警告： 比對找不到結構描述。Warning: Matching schema not found. 未發生驗證。No validation occurred. 找不到項目 root 的結構描述資訊。Could not find schema information for the element 'root'. 驗證錯誤： 項目 'xsdHeadCount:HeadCount' 具有無效的子項目 '除法'。Validation error: The element 'xsdHeadCount:HeadCount' has invalid child element 'division'. 預期的是 'ID'。Expected 'ID'.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::ValidationType ValidationType { System::Xml::ValidationType get(); void set(System::Xml::ValidationType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 是否會在讀取時執行驗證或類型指派。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the will perform validation or type assignment when reading.

value.span: 其中一個 值，指出 XmlReader 在讀取時是否執行驗證或型別指派。

span.span: One of the values that indicates whether XmlReader will perform validation or type assignment when reading.
The default is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表描述值。The following table describes the values. > [!NOTE] > 和列舉值是在.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The and enumeration values are obsolete in .NET Framework version 2.0. |ValidationTypeValidationType|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |`DTD`|使用文件類型定義 (DTD) 會執行驗證。Validation is performed using a document type definition (DTD). **注意：** 屬性也必須設定為。**Note:** The property must also be set to .| |`None`|不會驗證資料，或執行任何類型的指派。The does not validate data, or perform any type assignment.| |`Schema`|使用 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述執行驗證和型別指派。Validation and type assignment is performed using an XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema. 讀取器存取使用下列 XML 結構描述：The reader accesses the XML Schema using the following:

-使用屬性來存取這個讀取器相關聯的物件。- Uses the property to access the object associated with this reader.
-使用 XML 執行個體文件中包含的內建結構描述。- Uses the in-line schema contained in the XML instance document. (必須啟用選項。)(The option must be enabled.)
-使用結構描述位置提示所指定的 XML 結構描述 (`xsi:schemaLocation`或`xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation`屬性) 的 XML 執行個體文件中找到。- Uses the XML Schema specified by schema location hints (`xsi:schemaLocation` or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` attribute) found in the XML instance document. (必須啟用選項。)(The option must be enabled.)| ## Examples 下列範例會驗證使用儲存在結構描述。The following example validates using a schema stored in the . [!code-cpp[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/CPP/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/CS/validschemaset.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/VB/validschemaset.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列的輸入的檔案：The sample uses the following input files: `booksSchemaFail.xml` [!code-xml[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/XML/booksschemafail.xml#2)] `books.xsd` [!code-xml[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/XML/books.xsd#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlResolver ^ XmlResolver { void set(System::Xml::XmlResolver ^ value); };

summary.span: 設定用來存取外部文件的 。

span.span: Sets the used to access external documents.
An used to access external documents.

value.span: 如果設為 ，則在 嘗試存取外部資源時會擲回 。

span.span: If set to , an is thrown when the tries to access an external resource.
The default is a new with no credentials.

value.span: 從開始使用.NET Framework 4.5.2，這項設定有預設值是。

span.span: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, this setting has a default value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用來尋找和開啟 XML 執行個體文件，或用來找出並開啟 XML 執行個體文件所參考的任何外部資源。The is used to locate and open an XML instance document, or to locate and open any external resources referenced by the XML instance document. 這可以包含實體、 DTD 或結構描述。This can include entities, DTD, or schemas. 屬性可以用來指定任何所需的網路驗證的認證。The property can be used to specify any credentials required for network authentication. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為可以包含機密資訊，例如使用者認證，您應該要特別小心快取時物件，或傳遞時物件到另一個元件。Because the can contain sensitive information such as user credentials, you should be careful when caching objects, or when passing the object from one component to another. > > 可以用來存取外部的文件。An can be used to access external documents. 類別可以協助保護的另一個實作包裝物件，並限制資源的基礎具有存取權。The class helps to secure another implementation of by wrapping the object and restricting the resources that the underlying has access to. > > 依預設，不會設定 物件的 及 驗證旗標。The and validation flags of an object are not set by default. 當設定這些旗標時， 物件的 可用於解析在 的執行個體文件中發現的結構描述位置。When these flags are set, the of the object is used to resolve schema locations encountered in the instance document in the . 如果物件是`null`，就不會解析結構描述位置即使和設定驗證旗標。If the object is `null`, schema locations are not resolved even if the and validation flags are set. > > 驗證期間加入的結構描述會加入新型別，並可變更要驗證之物件的驗證結果。Schemas added during validation add new types and can change the validation outcome of the document being validated. 因此，外部結構描述應僅從受信任的來源解析。As a result, external schemas should only be resolved from trusted sources. ## Examples 下列範例會建立使用具有預設認證。The following example creates an that uses an with default credentials. [!code-csharp[XmlReader.Create#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.Create/CS/XmlReader_Create.cs#10)] [!code-vb[XmlReader.Create#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.Create/VB/XmlReader_Create.vb#10)]
